pages.name: index
pages.title: GoVCL | Cross-platform native Go GUI development library
pages.description: govcl - Cross-platform native Go GUI development library
pages.description2: Easy to use, write once, compile on multiple platforms.
pages.description3: GoVCL is a completely open source, free, cross-platform Go language GUI library, and the underlying binding is from Delphi VCL / Lazarus LCL
